data.name: Fishborg Planter
data.desc: Once, while this card is in the GY: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY, then, if it is a WATER monster, Special Summon this card from the GY. You can only use this effect of "Fishborg Planter" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep
